metadata.name: The Sacred Heart of Bureaucracy
metadata.description:
Evangelizing politicians ever since we killed God.

A portrait of the Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. A homage to the Sacred Heart of Jesus prayer card by Fratelli Bonella, a kitsch staple in Catholicism. 

The original 22" x 16" charcoal drawing is included with primary purchase; professionally framed behind UV-protective, anti-reflective and shatter resistant glass. 

This charcoal drawing took 36 hours to complete.
